original_title: Sagara Kariyawasam to chair committee probing Sri Lanka’s bankruptcy
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A Parliamentary Select Committee has been appointed to probe into Sri Lanka's bankruptcy and submit recommendations on the matter.
The Parliamentary Select Committee will be chaired by Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna MP Attorney Sagara Kariyawasam.

Other members of the committee include State Minister D.V. Chanaka, Minister Pavithradevi Wanniarachchi, MP Vijitha Herath, MP Mahindananda Aluthgamage, MP Eran Wickramaratne, MP Ashok Abeysinghe, MP Jayantha Ketagoda, MP Harshana Rajakaruna, MP Pradeep Undugoda, MP Sanjeeva Edirimanna, MP Nalaka Kottegoda, MP Shanakiyan Rasamanickam, and MP Ranjith Bandara.
